events.title: Game On: Fresher's Challenge
events.brief: Freshers' team-building games and creative challenges.
events.description:
Mind Quest, in collaboration with Reboot, organized Game On: Fresher's Challenge' on October 11th Oct, 2024 bringing together freshers for an exhilarating night of games, strategy, and teamwork. Designed to break the ice and encourage camaraderie among students, the event was packed with interactive challenges, competitive spirit, and exciting rewards.
  Event Highlights
 üéØ Tower of Hanoi ‚Äì A test of logic and problem-solving where teams raced against time to complete the classic puzzle.
  üé® Drawing Relay ‚Äì A fun and creative challenge requiring coordination and teamwork to convey ideas through sketches.
  ü§î Who Am I? ‚Äì An engaging guessing game that encouraged interaction and laughter.
  üñå Pictionary ‚Äì A game of quick thinking and artistic expression, bringing out the competitive side of participants.

  üí° The event also featured an exciting prize for the winners‚Äîa one-month Netflix 4K subscription for four users, adding an extra layer of motivation and thrill to the competition.
  The event saw enthusiastic participation, creating an energetic and welcoming atmosphere for the freshers. Game On was a massive success, fostering new friendships, teamwork, and unforgettable memories for everyone involved!

events.title: National Well-being Conclave
events.brief: Mental health strategies for academic institutions.
events.description:
Following the success of the first, the Second National Well-being Conclave was held on 9th and 10th November 2024 at IIT Hyderabad, with a focus on expanding the mental health and well-being initiatives for students and faculty at higher education institutions (HEIs) across India.

Event Highlights:
More than 200 institutions participated, including prominent IITs, NITs, IIITs, and IIMs.
The event brought together 350 students and faculty members from across the country for meaningful discussions and workshops.
This event saw a collaborative effort aimed at addressing immediate mental health needs and implementing long-term preventive measures. The programme focuses on promoting a culture of mental well-being, encouraging healthy behavior, and providing students with the necessary tools and support to manage mental health challenges.
This initiative is crucial for fostering a supportive academic environment that is equipped to tackle mental health issues, ensuring better overall well-being for students and faculty alike.

events.title: Mind Week Event: Speed Reading for Exam Success üöÄ
events.brief: Speed reading workshop for efficient exam prep.
events.description:
As part of Mind Week, the Speed Reading for Exam Success workshop was held from January 20th to 24th, 2025. The session attracted students eager to enhance their reading speed and retention, especially with exams on the horizon.
The workshop focused on techniques to speed read while ensuring full retention of key information‚Äîa skill that proved invaluable for navigating through extensive study materials, including numerous PPTs and textbooks. Participants learned how to efficiently absorb information, enabling them to cover more material in less time.
Attendees were encouraged to bring along a non-technical book, a small notebook/diary, and a pencil to practice the skills taught during the session. The workshop provided both theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience, with students leaving the event feeling more prepared for the upcoming exams.
Overall, the event was a huge success, helping students boost their productivity and exam readiness.

events.title: Outreach Activity by IIIT Kottayam ‚Äì Empowering the Next Generation! üåü
events.brief: School outreach with educational games and inspiration.
events.description:
On January 24th, 2025, Mind Quest IIIT Kottayam, led by Ms. Renjitha, our club faculty in charge, organized an exciting outreach session at NSS High School, Edanad. The event aimed to inspire young minds with a series of engaging activities and thought-provoking discussions.
In addition to the insightful talks, the event featured fun games that encouraged teamwork and creativity among the students. Prizes were up for grabs,  fostering a lively and rewarding atmosphere.
This outreach initiative was  the part of IIIT Kottayam's mission to extend education, inspiration, and innovation beyond the campus, ensured  that students from all communities  can  have access to valuable knowledge and experiences.

events.title: MindQuest Christmas Bash - A Night of Joy, Games & Festive Magic! üéÑ‚ú®
events.brief: A Christmas Eve filled with laughter, unexpected twists, and unforgettable moments, made special by MindQuest volunteers.
events.description:
The MindQuest Christmas celebration was nothing short of spectacular! With surprise performances, friendly game rivalries, and non-stop laughter, it was a night to remember. 

üé≠ Unforgettable Moments: 
üéÖ Unexpected themed getups that had everyone in splits! 
üéÆ A rollercoaster of fun in Scribble, Gartic Phone, and card battles‚Äîwhere strategy met pure chaos. 
üéµ Beatboxing, quirky pickup lines, and impromptu performances that stole the show! 
‚ùÑ A surprise contestant who turned the tables and left everyone amazed! 
üì∏ Silent snapshots capturing the best moments‚Äîreels coming soon!

This wasn't just a party‚Äîit was an experience. From the first laugh to the final cheer, the night was filled with the true spirit of Christmas! Until next time, let the memories live on! üéâ‚ùÑ
